Package com.xebisco.yield

Class Entity

java.lang.Object
com.xebisco.yield.Entity
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Entity>
public final class Entity extends Object implements Comparable<Entity>
An Entity is a combination of Components and other Entities(called children), can contain game logic and be displayed on the screen.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Entity(String name, YldScene scene, Entity parent)
    Creates an entity with a Transform component and a Renderer component.

    • Entity

      public Entity(String name, YldScene scene, Entity parent)
      Creates an entity with a Transform component and a Renderer component.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of this Entity.
      scene - The scene of this Entity.
      parent - The parent Entity.

  • Method Details

    • process

      public void process(float delta, SampleGraphics graphics)
      Updates all the components of this Entity and all the systems in the scene of this Entity.
      Parameters:
      delta - The time variation between the last frame and the actual one in seconds.

    • instantiate

      public Entity instantiate(Prefab prefab, YldB yldB, Vector2 pos, MultiThread multiThread)
      It creates an entity, sets its position, and then adds it to the children list.
      Parameters:
      prefab - The prefab to instantiate.
      yldB - The YldB that contains concurrent information.
      pos - The position of the entity.
      multiThread - This is a boolean that determines whether the entity should be added to the scene in a separate thread.
      Returns:
      The entity that was just created.

    • instantiate

      public Entity instantiate(Prefab prefab, Vector2 pos, Engine engine)
      It creates an entity, sets its position, and then adds it to the children list.
      Parameters:
      prefab - The prefab to instantiate.
      pos - The position of the entity.
      engine - The engine that will be used to create this entity.
      Returns:
      The entity that was just created.

    • sortChildren

      public void sortChildren()
      Sorts the children of this entity and calls 'sortChildren()' on all of his children.

    • instantiate

      public Entity instantiate(Prefab prefab, YldB yldB)
      This function creates a new entity from a prefab, and returns it. The first parameter is the prefab to instantiate. The second parameter is the YldB to instantiate the entity in. The third parameter is the MultiThread to use
      Parameters:
      prefab - The prefab to instantiate.
      yldB - The YldB that contains concurrent information.
      Returns:
      An Entity
